In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Saint Jos√© Luis, though just a boy, you courageously shed your blood for Christ and received the crown of martyrdom. Pray for us here in the Church Militant, as we fight against the enemies of Christ and His Church, and especially for the intention I now offer (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Jos√© Luis, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
